thread.title: ‘Lost in Space’ Returns in a Dark Reboot

author: John Jurgensen
title: ‘Lost in Space’ Returns in a Dark Reboot
text:
In 1965, the future was a lumbering silver robot with astonishing computing abilities and a programmed instinct (“Danger, Will Robinson!”) to protect its human companions.
After that “B-9” unit was introduced in the television series “Lost in Space,” fictional ‘bots evolved dramatically, from “2001” through “The Terminator.” The real versions have, too, including the now-ubiquitous artificial-intelligence devices answering to names like Alexa and Siri.
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
